org.seedstack.business.api.interfaces.assembler

Class BaseAssembler<A extends AggregateRoot<?>,D>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.seedstack.business.api.interfaces.assembler.AbstractBaseAssembler<A,D>
      • org.seedstack.business.api.interfaces.assembler.BaseAssembler<A,D>
  • Type Parameters:
    A - the aggregate root type
    D - the dto type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Assembler<A,D>

    public abstract class BaseAssembler<A extends AggregateRoot<?>,D>
extends AbstractBaseAssembler<A,D>
    This class is the class to be extended by the users in order to create an Assembler.

    User must implements doAssembleDtoFromAggregate(Object, org.seedstack.business.api.domain.AggregateRoot) and doMergeAggregateWithDto(org.seedstack.business.api.domain.AggregateRoot, Object) to provide implementation of the copy.

    For instance: 
     public class ProductAssembler extends BaseAssembler<Product,ProductRepresentation> {

      @Override
     protected void doAssembleDtoFromAggregate(ProductRepresentation targetDto, Product sourceAggregate) {
          targetDto.fillProductId(sourceAggregate.getEntityId().getStoreId(),
              sourceAggregate.getEntityId().getProductCode());
          targetDto.setName(sourceAggregate.getName());
          targetDto.setDescription(sourceAggregate.getDescription());
     }

      @Override
     protected void doMergeAggregateWithDto(Product targetAggregate, ProductRepresentation sourceDto) {
          targetAggregate.setName(sourceDto.getName());
          targetAggregate.setDescription(sourceDto.getDescription());
     }
 }
    Then the assembler can be used via: 
      @Inject
 ProductAssembler productAssembler;
    And used like this: 
     ProductRepresentation productRepresentation = productAssembler.assembleDtoFromAggregate(productFromRepo);
    or 
     productAssembler.mergeAggregateWithDto(productToMerge, productRepresentationSource);
    Author:
    epo.jemba@ext.mpsa.com

    • Method Detail

      • assembleDtoFromAggregate

        public D assembleDtoFromAggregate(A sourceAggregate)
        This method is used by developers or by the DSL to assemble a new DTO from the given aggregate.
        • It calls AbstractBaseAssembler.newDto() for the DTO creation
        • and doAssembleDtoFromAggregate(Object, org.seedstack.business.api.domain.AggregateRoot) for the assembly algorithm.
        Parameters:
        sourceAggregate - The aggregate from which create the DTO.
        Returns:
        the assembled DTO
        See Also:
        Assembler.assembleDtoFromAggregate(Object)

      • assembleDtoFromAggregate

        public void assembleDtoFromAggregate(D sourceDto,
                                     A sourceAggregate)
        Description copied from interface: Assembler
        Updates an existing DTO with a source aggregate root.
        Parameters:
        sourceDto - The target dto
        sourceAggregate - The source aggregate

      • doAssembleDtoFromAggregate

        protected abstract void doAssembleDtoFromAggregate(D targetDto,
                                                   A sourceAggregate)
        This method has to be overridden by users to actually assemble the DTO from the aggregate. 
         targetDto.fillProductId(sourceAggregate.getEntityId().getStoreId(),
     sourceAggregate.getEntityId().getProductCode());

      • mergeAggregateWithDto

        public void mergeAggregateWithDto(A targetAggregate,
                                  D sourceDto)
        This method is used by developers or by the DSL to actually merge the aggregate.

        It will call doMergeAggregateWithDto(org.seedstack.business.api.domain.AggregateRoot, Object), which is overridden by developers.

        Parameters:
        targetAggregate - the target aggregate
        sourceDto - the source dto
        See Also:
        Assembler.mergeAggregateWithDto(Object, Object)

      • doMergeAggregateWithDto
